# Celestia - Modular Blockchain Network
> Celestia is the **modular blockchain** powering unstoppable applications with full-stack control. The first network to enable anyone to deploy their own blockchain in minutes.

Celestia provides scalable data availability for rollups, enabling new types of decentralized applications that weren't possible before.
